entry.title: Iran Steps Up Deportations of Afghans Trying to Flee Taliban and Poverty
entry.content: A record number of expulsions add to the tension on the Iranian-Afghan border months after the collapse of the U.S.-backed government in Kabul.

entry.title: In France, Criticism Grows Over U.S.-Inspired Social Activism
entry.content: President Emmanuel Macron and some other public figures say that “woke” movements reflecting American ideas about multiculturalism pose a threat to French society.

entry.title: After Battling Israel, Hamas's Popularity Rests on Hopes It Can Collect the West Bank's Trash
entry.content: Local elections will test whether Hamas can hold on to gains after it received a jolt of popular support from Palestinians in the West Bank following a conflict with Israel in spring.
